t: A Song{H7892} of degrees{H4609}. They that trust{H982}{(H8802)} in the LORD{H3068} shall be as mount{H2022} Zion{H6726}, which cannot be removed{H4131}{(H8735)}, but abideth{H3427}{(H8799)} for ever{H5769}.
As the mountains{H2022} are round about{H5439} Jerusalem{H3389}, so the LORD{H3068} is round about{H5439} his people{H5971} from henceforth even for{H5704} ever{H5769}.

For the rod{H7626} of the wicked{H7562} shall not rest{H5117}{(H8799)} upon the lot{H1486} of the righteous{H6662}; lest{H4616} the righteous{H6662} put forth{H7971}{(H8799)} their hands{H3027} unto iniquity{H5766}.
Do good{H2895}{(H8685)}, O LORD{H3068}, unto those that be good{H2896}, and to them that are upright{H3477} in their hearts{H3826}.

As for such as turn aside{H5186}{(H8688)} unto their crooked ways{H6128}, the LORD{H3068} shall lead them forth{H3212}{(H8686)} with the workers{H6466}{(H8802)} of iniquity{H205}: but peace{H7965} shall be upon Israel{H3478}.
